name: Solita
description:
Welcome to our page! 

We're working on a 2.5D action-rpg. The project is still early in development. So we'll be trying to post updates regularly. Our goal current goal is to build the community for feedback and help us see this project come to life. 

Here's the pitch:
A 2.5D fantasy action role-playing video game, which features a playable mercenary knight on a journey to reunite the kingdom to its glory days before the four lords let power and fame go to their heads.

Target platforms:
PC, Xbox, Playstation, and Nintendo Switch
